Cloud Hosting Services

The computing solution for the modern digital era is CLOUD. That’s the right answer for your storage purpose. Cloud servers are the computing technique of the century and if you are yet to move to the latest technology, Web Werks can help you get there. Scrutinizing your specific requirements, Web Werks have formulated hosting options that can contribute in improving performance, while generate profitable statement. We provide you the right cloud infrastructure with right resources, ensuring top-notch technical support along with data security to keep your business online always.M

Web Werks cloud hosting services are designed keeping in mind your IT requirements to provide you an improved ROI along with ultimate flexibility and data security assurance. Our proven, tested and trustworthy approach will help you in determining the business drivers and components with understanding of deployment in a Private or Public Cloud Environment.

Our solutions offer cloud flexibility and scalability for your business applications through our multiple Cloud hosting platforms. Users can also benefit from our diversified data center locations ensuring quick response time and high availability. Our global delivery network serve with local data presence, complemented with higher enterprise security. Managed cloud hosting servers by Web Werks come with additional benefits of guidance from our expert professionals. This helps clients in meeting their strategic business goals effectively and efficiently.

How we additionally benefit you?
Everyone knows the dynamic advantages of cloud solutions. But how can we benefit you, while offering our solutions. Web Werks cloud-hosting services are designed after analyzing the unique needs of different customers that could provide optimum results. We offer both public cloud and private cloud, so you choose the computing type as per your need. In addition, we also deliver the flexibility to control and access your environment through our multiple cloud hosting platforms.

Users can also benefit from our diversified data center locations ensuring quick response time and high availability. Managed cloud hosting servers by Web Werks come with additional benefits of guidance from our expert professionals. This helps clients in meeting their strategic business goals effectively and efficiently. From computing, to backup storage and disaster recovery, we offer everything.

Our Range of Cloud Server Hosting Platforms

Cloud VPS
Our Cloud VPS are container-based virtual servers, which are fully compatible with Linux operating systems and its multiple variants. Web Werks Cloud VPS are easily upgradable directly through the control panel. Once you have ordered your Cloud VPS, our auto-provision takes less than 5 Minutes to deploy. Hosting on Cloud VPS is reliable, economical, scalable and fast. Cloud VPS, maintained in a virtualized server, on redundant environment.
Web Werks Cloud VPS are easily upgradable directly through the control panel. Our auto-provision takes less than 5 Minutes to deploy new virtual cloud machines. You can also customize your Cloud VPS with preference to RAM/CPU, storage and OS that best meet your needs. With the console from your container management control panel, you get access to your server.
You can also order your customized Cloud VPS’s and select your preference with RAM, CPU, Storage and Operating System based on your requirements. It can also be accessed with Console from your Container management control Panel.

Cloud VPS Features

Economical

Container-based VM

1Gbp/s Port

Scalable resources

SSH and VNC Console Access

Easy migration from any other Cloud platform

Managed and unmanaged Backup options



RapidvCloud
Introducing RapidvCloud; our strategic next generation cloud computing solution is action-packed with a lot of advanced computing features, flexibility and Infrastructure. The ability to create / allocate new Virtual Machines and compute resources make it more advanced to any other cloud hosting or storage services offered in the market. You can also procure additionally required compute resources and create Virtual Machines by your own as and when required from one Console Management System.

Our RapidvCloud is compatible with both Windows and Linux Operating Systems to meet variant application and web needs. With the help of our RapidvCloud, you can also create and operate multiple VM’s with different functionalities for your business such as web vServers, Application vServers, Email vServers, database vServers or even vLoad-balancers.

RapidvCloud Features

High-end Configuration Cloud Nodes

Virtual Machine based

Auto-Compute Provisioning

Centralized VM Management

Easy migration to other VPS plan

Cloud VPS access through SSH, Console, VNC or RDP

Managed and unmanaged Backup options

Plesk and cPanel Support

Flexible Payment options

1 Gbp/s Port

Easily Upgradable

Multi-OS Support

Microsoft Azure Cloud
We have collaborated with Microsoft Azure Cloud to deliver services of the most-trusted cloud company. The platform allows users to develop, manage, and host applications from an off-site location. Our SQL Azure provides database services in the cloud. It excels in all aspects – performance, security, reliability, scalability, flexibility, data backup and more. It is something that is offered at low prices with a host of privileges. With Azure cloud, your business will gradually improve performance, as it speeds up processes and improves overall efficiency. Most of the large enterprises have invested their trust in it and are reaping the best of it.
Our Microsoft Azure Cloud computing platform delivers unmatched performance through our TIER III and TIER IV Data Centers. Microsoft Azure cloud is bundled with built-in templates and integrated tools that make operations much easier for anyone of us. It offers unparalleled speed and its managed services help in enterprise management. MS Azure is the most reliable cloud platform as it is robustly designed to manage huge workloads. Most of the large enterprises have invested their trust in it and are reaping the positive benefits.
With on-demand resources, you can easily scale your rapidly developing business to million users without additional coding. Our Azure cloud platform is available with instant deployment service and cutting-edge features that will help users in better decision making and unleashing several business opportunities. A major advantage of our Azure Cloud is the ability to integrate your IT environment through hybrid databases, storage solutions and security features. Above all, you can easily balance your specific web requirements and your IT budget with our MS Azure cloud platform.

Microsoft Azure Cloud Features

Fully compatible with multiple OS

Supports major Programming Language, framework, tools & devices

Supports Linux containers with Docker integration

Enterprise grade SLA

24x7 Rapid Action Support

Round the clock service level monitoring


More cloud platforms available are Public Cloud, Private Cloud, Tally on Cloud, WordPress Cloud
